Minor Admission Requirements
None
Minor Requirements
None
Prerequisite Courses
None

courseSection0.text0:
Earn at least 18 credits from the following types of courses: 
AFH, AMH, ASH, EUH, HIS, LAH and/or WOH courses offered by the History department. A minimum of 12 hours must be taken at the upper level.
courseSection0.text1: A list of approved restricted elective courses is found in the myKnight audit.

li.A grade of \"C\" (2.0) or better is requ: A grade of "C" (2.0) or better is required in all courses used to satisfy the minor.
li.At least 12 hours used in the minor must: At least 12 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the department.
li.No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit): No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used without academic advisor's approval.
li.Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study: Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor without departmental approval.

courseSection0.text:
Other Requirements

A grade of "C" (2.0) or better is required in all courses used to satisfy the minor.
At least 12 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the department.
No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used without academic advisor's approval.
Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor without departmental approval.
